long_description: Here's a comfortable and convenient chair for all your bleacher-based activities-the GCI Outdoor Bleacherback(TM). Chair seat secures easily to bleacher with use of a single, rugged quick-release buckle. Seat cushion with 1.5 in. of padding offers long-lasting comfort. One-side backstrap buckle allows unlimited lounging positions. Convenient oversized storage pouch in seat back keeps essentials close by. Auto-fold carrying strap provides ultra-portable transport. GCI Outdoor Bleacherback(TM) chair has a powder-coated steel frame and 600-denier polyester fabric that provide long-lasting use.
short_description: Here's a comfortable and convenient chair for all your bleacher-based activities-the GCI Outdoor Bleacherback(TM).
